programme.title: WA World Athletics Championships
programme.desc: Its the penultimate day at the World Athletics Championships, and Sarah Mulkerins has highlights of all the action. Can Katarina Johnson-Thompson defend the title she won in Budapest two years ago? Its the javelin and the 800m to finish her campaign. programme.desc: Katarina Johnson-Thompsons defence of her world heptathlon title reaches a conclusion with the final two events, the javelin and the 800m, on the penultimate night of action from the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo. Its a busy night for the relay teams, with the men and womens 4 x 400m and 4 x 100m heats. After Great Britain won gold in all four events at the 2024 Paris Olympics, hopes are high for more medals, but they will have to reach tomorrows finals first.

programme.title: The Railway Children
programme.desc: Based on Edith Nesbits book about three children whose lives change dramatically after they move from a comfortable townhouse to a small Yorkshire cottage near a railway line. Their mother is forced to make the move after their father was wrongly imprisoned, but the children, ignorant of the circumstances, soon settle into their new home, enchanted by the countryside and enthralled by the railway.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Whether savoury or sweet, the British love puddings. Dave and Si create some classic puds and explore the history and traditions behind our favourites. There is no point in counting calories with delicious puds, but the bikers do try and burn some off when they take part in the world black-pudding throwing competition in Lancashire.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: Its the final, and after challenges including the bias cut dress, sheer fabrics and trompe loeil, one sewer will be crowned winner.

programme.title: Final Score
programme.desc: Jason Mohammad and guests bring you all the goals, latest news, analysis, reaction and interviews from the afternoons biggest football matches.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Village
programme.desc: A year in the life of an extraordinary village, hidden away in the timeless French countryside. We reveal the parallel world of incredible tiny creatures that live side by side with the unsuspecting humans.

programme.title: Michael Portillos 200 Years of the Rail
programme.sub-title: The Day That Changed the World
programme.desc: Railway enthusiast Michael Portillo leads a landmark journey through 200 years of rail, marking the moment Britains modern railway was born.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Countdown host and maths queen Rachel Riley competes with her husband and former Strictly partner, dancer Pasha Kovalev, to find the most profitable antiques. Paul Martin and David Harper are on hand to help scour the shops of Rachels home county of Essex.

programme.title: Johnny Mathis: Tribute to Nat King Cole
programme.desc: A musical tribute to Nat King Cole with special guest Natalie Cole. Johnny Mathis recalls and sings the music of one of the greatest and most endearing musician-singers of the 20th century. From 1983.

programme.title: Johnny Mathis
programme.desc: From 1974, Johnny Mathis in concert with the Alan Peters Orchestra, recorded at the Apollo Centre, Glasgow.

programme.title: Kindling
programme.desc: A group of young men return to their hometown in order to transform their friends final days into a celebration of life and friendship. Together they live out a summer to be remembered.

programme.title: The Guest
programme.desc: Fran offers Ria an exciting promotion, but doubts set in when unsettling revelations come to light that call her motives into question.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Mervin is about to fly home but finds himself at the centre of a murder investigation when a body is discovered in his shack. As Mervin professes his innocence, the team cannot work out how the victim ended up inside a locked building.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Its semi-finals time, and the challenges include catering for members of the Jane Austen Society, not to mention a descendant of the famous author!

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michaels exploration of Essex continues in Romford, where he visits a state-of-the-art rail operating centre. On the River Blackwater, he visits the Ross Revenge, home of Radio Caroline.

programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in his car. He decides to recreate the bunch. Mr Bean is asked to wear a sheep costume to help advertise Irmas knitwear stall.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Go Jetters

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Sula and Bing tag their favourite things around the house with heart-shaped stickies. Sometimes they have different favourites and sometimes their favourite things are the same. But when Sula tags Hoppity Voosh, Bing is upset because Hoppity is his most favourite of favourites and hes not sure he wants to share him.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Today is Topsy Turvy Day, a day when everyone has to do things the opposite way to how theyd normally do them. This confuses Love Monster, especially after he wakes up to hear Elder Kitten wishing everyone a good evening.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Preston needs to knock down his shed, and Mojo has the wrecking ball to do it. But first, Mojo and Bo have to get it all the way across town, which is harder than it sounds!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: When a fancy new ice cream machine comes to Chuggington, Frostini feels left behind and goes in search of his true passion.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea uses a remote control to drive Supertato to the far side of the supermarket.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing drives his toy car around the breakfast things on the table and accidentally spills Krispos all over the kitchen floor. He helps Flop to clear them up with the aid of the voo-voo cleaner but neither of them notices when Bings car gets sucked up along with the Krispos.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and his friends are making leaf pictures in the woods. They take a piece of paper, place it on a leaf and rub a crayon onto it. They each choose their own leaf, but Bings is whisked away by the wind! Luckily, he manages to catch it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: A big box of bits and pieces is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are very excited. Duggee and the Squirrels will have to work very hard to put it all together, so its time for a bit of teamwork.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: A dancing bug lands on Duggees head, and he cant stop dancing. The Squirrels take a close look and see that its a tiny hillbilly bug with a fiddle. Whats more, hes got a whole band with him - the Hillbilly Bug Band.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: In France, Grandmaster Glitch breaks the Eiffel Tower when he uses it as a TV aerial. Can the Go Jetters fix it?

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of Mums Precious Things
programme.desc: When Peter accidentally discards his mothers most precious possessions he must retrieve them from Tommy Brock!

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: The Octonauts are trying to save a pod of spinner dolphins who keep swimming in their sleep, but it is a hard task.

programme.title: Activate with Joe Wicks
programme.desc: Cowabunga. Can you graduate from my tubular Surfer Challenge? Welcome to surf school, where we test your surf skills to the limit. We will be doing runners, climbers and burpees, followed by the Activate.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Zigzag hasnt had a poo in two days and doesnt want to go on the scavenger hunt with her friends. Vida sets up a scavenger hunt just for her in the clinic, which is full of clues to help her go.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Theres a girder out of place on Swoppiton Bridge, and unless Nori can fix it, that bridge is coming down! Luckily, Mojos got the tops and Bos got the skills to help get it done.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and his friend meet some amazing reptiles and make a snake sock puppet. Mr Tumble has his own animal fun when five speckled frogs come to visit.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey creates a zoo in her backyard that features all sorts of amazing creatures, including the big blue daddy gorilla. When he escapes, zookeeper Bluey attempts to track him down.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Coco wants to play Wild Girls with Indy, but Chloe wants her to play another game.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The squirrels are helping Duggee in the garden when Tag makes friends with a caterpillar. This caterpillar is very hungry, so Tag feeds her all the vegetable leaves theyve been picking. She eats and eats and eats and gets bigger and bigger. Wow!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Its lovely and warm - just right for a day on the beach. The squirrels learn how to make sandcastles - dig, dig, dig! They are doing such a good job that Jon and Nigel ask the crabs if the squirrels could work together to build them a new home. They create the most spectacular giant sandcastle ever seen, with shells, seaweed, great views and lots of sand.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: Flutter helps Brinicle with his brioche baking, but it leaves the Piris with a problem.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When DORIS reveals a large meteor is about to land on the spaceship, its finally time to leave. But should Big Lizard leave too? What about all those who need him on Proxima?

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: A giant Grandmaster Glitch means big trouble for the Giants Causeway - can the Go Jetters stop him in his tracks?

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: It is a very foggy day, and the Golden Gate Bridge foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: Spidey and Ghosty save the Bubble Festival from Gobbys super strong bubbles. Spidey and Ant-Man have to work together to rescue Aunt Mays doll when it gets washed down a storm drain.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts expand their exploration beyond the sea - and onto land. With new rides and new friends, they are prepared to protect any habitats and animals at risk on land or under the water.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato runs in fright when Pumpkin tries to make friends with him, but he later realises she needs his help as shes stuck in the air hanging from balloons set up by Evil Pea.

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: When Mila loses her voice Pat makes fun of her. Lamar puts him at the Krakens helm!

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan takes on a new career - Doctor, Pizza Chef, Hair Stylist, Sea Captain - and invites his friends Ozzy, Daisy, Bitsy, and the viewers at home to play along with him.

programme.title: Dog Squad
programme.desc: Hearing dog Diesel is off to the beach with his owner Rayane so he can try out the new metal detector he got for his birthday. Rayane is deaf, which means he doesnt hear everything, and Diesels super ears are trained to alert him to important sounds he might miss. Diesel is Rayanes ears! Rayane and Diesel have been practising with the metal detector in the garden.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Elsa is using salt fish to make a fishcake recipe she has learnt from her father. She starts by mashing potatoes with butter before adding lots of other tasty ingredients such as chives. Not everyone likes the taste of chives before they are cooked but hopefully they will enjoy them in the finished recipe. When her friends arrive, Elsa greets them with a special pineapple drink served in pineapple-shaped cups.

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures
programme.desc: There has been a special sleep over event at Safari World, where visitors had the chance to see all the nocturnal animals. Andy heads to the Aqua Base to find out how it went. Jen informs Andy that it has been a huge success.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Tao cant go on with his circus performance, so there are going to be some disappointed fans, unless Bo agrees to do all the acts for him - with some help from Mojos tops!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggees Clubhouse is a bit like Cubs or Scouts, but for pre-school children. Its run by a big dog called Duggee - who is a cross between a nursery school teacher and a brown dog.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: The Octonauts must evacuate sea creatures before an underwater volcano erupts, but theres one creature that wont budge: a slow moving, gelatinous Blobfish.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Sunny has trouble sleeping at the clinic. Vida gathers all his comforts of home to help.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are exploring Cheddar Gorge and enjoying its rocky slopes. But Glitch, learning about the towns love of cheese, pays a visit to the gorge in order to share his fondue with the locals. This backfires horribly when he accidentally floods the gorge with the cheesy mixture. Its up to the Go Jetters to rescue the tourists, the sheep and the Grimbots - but will Foz be able to overcome his fear of heights and save a lost lamb?

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.sub-title: Mountain Gorillas, The Democratic Republic of the Congo
programme.desc: When a cold-ridden Glitchs sneezing breaks his TV, the Grimbots take him to the Virunga National Park in the Democratic Republic of the Congo to see a real mountain gorilla. But Glitch doesnt realise how dangerous his cold germs can be, so the Go Jetters will have to stop him from making a baby gorilla sick - all while trying to keep it safe from dangerous traps left by hunters.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Its Tidy Up Day, so everyone in Fluffytown is tidying things. Love Monster helps Book Cub to clean up the forest, and as he does so, finds several items that would make great souvenirs. These include a bunny-shaped rock and a heart-shaped stone.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Sonny cant fit a rescued old tin bath into his caravan. Can TapTap find an unexpected use for it?

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its the fastest woodwind player pear attempting to be a one-pear orchestra and play three woodwind instruments.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Today, Mr Tumble is tidying up his bedroom. Meanwhile, Justin and his friends are playing in a recycling band!

programme.title: Big Cook Little Cook

programme.title: Playtime Towers
programme.desc: Bella and Lift visit the Cloud Kitchen, where Patch needs some help from the Playtimers to make hoopy owl bagels. Its time for a tasty adventure!

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Animated series for children.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Ted has entered his red rocket into the Pencaster Flying Machine Challenge, but when the rocket takes off unexpectedly, it is up to Pat and Jess to win the trophy.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: The shadow of a monster causes panic among the Piris, apart from Nugget, who is keen to investigate a new mystery. She finally tracks down the creature, but is all exactly as it seems?

programme.title: Andy And The Band

programme.title: Waffles After School Club
programme.desc: Its Waffles first ever after-school club, and Waffle is tentative about the new experience until class friends Daisy and Cole help him join in with an impromptu hoop hunt.

programme.desc: Following Dodge at Pup School, a place full of mishaps and mayhem. Dodge and his pup pals turn school days into adventures with singing, silliness, and occasional squeaky toys.

programme.title: Supertato

The interior is equally memorable, with Paul and Flora finding themselves in the Cappuccino Room and Caroline in the Poppy Room.

However, rogue underwear in the drawers and cobwebs on the curtains are touches that the guests arent so keen on.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.desc: Mr Burns tricks Homer into not suing him for a work-related injury by telling him hes won a bogus prize. Homer gets a big award ceremony, complete with Joe Frazier and a $2,000 cheque, which his impoverished brother Herb persuades him to invest in the worlds first-ever baby translator contraption.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart forges his school report so Homer will let him and Lisa go to Kamp Krusty for the Summer, but the dream camp turns out to be a sweat shop and Bart leads an uprising. Meanwhile, with the kids away, Homer gets into the best shape of his life and love breaks out in the Simpson household.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Craig Rowe helps Jacqui and Michael hunt for a holiday home in Abruzzo in Italy. Theyve always dreamed of finding a home in a mountain village that one day could become a permanent home. Craig has five great properties for Jacquis £70,000 budget.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: George meets an actor moving up the four-wheel property ladder and visits an underground bar covered in seashells. Plus: Its full steam ahead for a dog-friendly holiday let.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: In Surrey, can Kirstie help Elise and Elliot finally fly the nest into a place of their own? And Phils with Kim and Ralph, who want a taste of what they grew up with in Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Frank and Wilma are at an impasse over their four-bed family home in Strathaven. Now that their kids are flying the nest, Wilma has her sights set on the west coast. But Frank thinks they can still have many more happy years in the house.

programme.title: Worst House on the Street
programme.desc: Stuart and Scarlette help Carl and Lynn whove bought a bungalow in Leeds. But can they turn it around quick enough to fulfil their hope of being mortgage-free for retirement?

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its Break Week, and the bakers make pull-apart monkey bread, a fast food Technical and a sweet bread Showstopper. Wholl rise to the top and who kneads to dust themselves off?

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Baku boasts the fastest street circuit on the calendar. Norris was eliminated in Q1 here last year. A repeat would severely damage his title hopes - so hell be dialled in.

programme.title: Britains Railway Empire in Colour
programme.desc: Investigates how the rail compartment fascinated the Victorians as a place of intrigue and romance. As the 20th century dawned, railways continued to expand across the Empire. The Trans-Australia Railway was built.

programme.title: The Creator
programme.desc: As war rages between humanity and artificial intelligence forces, ex-special forces agent Joshua is recruited to find a person who has developed advanced artificial intelligence and a mystical weapon that could finally end the war.

programme.title: Peppermint
programme.desc: Riley awakens from a coma, after surviving an attack that killed both her husband and her daughter. When justice fails to prevail, Riley becomes an urban guerilla to serve up her own brand of punishment.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon heads to Arvada, Colorado, where husband-and-wife owners Randy and Alexa have allowed their Old Neighborhood restaurant to fall into utter disrepair.

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics treat a patient with an unusual stomach condition. On the night shift, a young man is intoxicated and passed out in the street. An elderly man has fallen at home and cannot get back up. The paramedics suspect he may have an infection.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Dales and the Lakes
programme.desc: A look at the Lakes and Dales as winter brings its challenges, from shepherding in Grasmere to Conistons steam yacht gondola.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Dales and the Lakes
programme.desc: A look at the Lakes and Dales as winter brings its challenges, from shepherding in Grasmere to Conistons steam yacht gondola.

programme.title: Zulm Ki Hukumat
programme.desc: A father and two sons cross an underworld don who launches a vendetta against them.

programme.title: Cinebuzz
programme.desc: The host interviews various media personalities, shares the latest news of the Bollywood industry and reviews the newest movies.

programme.title: Naina
programme.desc: After losing both her parents and her sight in a car crash at a young age, Naina Shah is brought up by her grandmother. Years later, she has an operation to cure her blindness, but begins to see strange things.

programme.title: What the Fish
programme.desc: A grumpy old woman travels abroad and puts her niece in charge of her house in Delhi, only to return to utter chaos and mess.

programme.title: Shershaah
programme.desc: The life of Indian army captain Vikram Batra, awarded with the Param Vir Chakra, Indias highest award for valour for his actions during the 1999 Kargil War.

programme.title: Paheli
programme.desc: Kishanlal marries the beautiful Lachchi, but the day after the wedding, he leaves on business for five years. When Kishanlal reappears only a few days later, Lachchi is delighted, but this new Kishanlal is in fact a spirit who has taken the form of Lachchis husband, after having seen her by chance and fallen in love with her. Four years later, the real Kishanlal returns and the townsfolk must determine who is who.

programme.title: OMG 2
programme.desc: A devout father takes on a dogmatic school - and his own moral convictions - after his son is expelled from school for an embarrassing video that has gone viral.

programme.title: Main Tera Hero
programme.desc: A mischievous collegian believes that Krishna sent him a beautiful woman to woo.

programme.title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
programme.desc: A young medical student falls in love with a man who plans to travel the world and never settle down or get married.

programme.title: Gehraiyaan
programme.desc: A woman finds herself at a crossroads in life. Her six year relationship has grown monotonous and her career seems to have hit a roadblock. However, the arrival of her cousin forces her to confront a troubled past.

programme.title: Zulmi
programme.desc: A spoiled woman and her bodyguard have a love-hate relationship.

programme.title: Zulmi
programme.desc: A spoiled woman and her bodyguard have a love-hate relationship.

programme.title: Dhaakad Beera
programme.desc: With courage as his superpower, eight-year-old Samrat becomes a one-man army for his baby sister Kishmishs right to live in a world ruled by cruel conventions he doesnt understand.

programme.desc: Lord Shiva and his wife, the Goddess Parvati, navigate their relationship and duties whilst offering sacrifices in their mission to care for humanity.

programme.desc: Noyontara, a 23-year-old ghost-whisperer has always lived on the fringes, ridiculed for her rare gift. Her life takes a drastic turn when she marries Surjo, a man of science and reason.

programme.desc: Celebrating Rachels 30th birthday inspires the friends to reminisce about their own 30th birthdays. Joey got angry with God for breaking their deal, Ross bought himself a sports car in an attempt to recapture his youth, and Monica got blind drunk and embarrassed herself at her surprise party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys New Brain
programme.desc: Joey accidentally informs a cast member that she will be fired so that his character will get her characters brain, and Ross plans a surprise for Monica and Chandlers wedding - he wants to play the bagpipes.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: US actor and singer Josh Groban hands over his phone to play Send to All and Michael heads to Newport for The Midnight Gameshow. Also featuring music from chart-topper Paloma Faith, and legendary funk and soul singer Nile Rogers and Chic perform.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
programme.desc: As the gang digests Monicas huge Thanksgiving meal, everyone reminisces about their worst Thanksgiving ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Warning notes on Ross lunch causes concern among his co-workers, and Phoebe takes a literature class.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister
programme.desc: After returning from another disappointing audition, Joey tries to write a play in which he can star. Meanwhile, Rachel gets a date with her neighbour Danny, but is perturbed to discover his extremely intimate relationship with his sexy sister.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Resolutions
programme.desc: The friends make their New Year resolutions, and Joey tries to arrange for Chandler to kiss Monica at midnight at a New Years Eve party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandlers Work Laugh
programme.desc: Monica is annoyed when she discovers Chandler is ingratiating himself with his new boss Doug. He even has a fake laugh which he uses whenever Doug cracks a joke. Meanwhile, Rachel is obsessed with finding out the gossip between Monica and Chandler after overhearing a sexy conversation between them, and Ross astounds everyone with his new girlfriend, a blast from the past.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: At her grandmothers funeral, Phoebe is astounded to meet her biological father, Frank Sr, who she has been trying to find for years. Elsewhere, Chandler tells perfectionist Monica that she is useless at massage, and Joeys fondness for an expensive bag loses him an audition.

programme.title: The Money Pit
programme.desc: An up-and-coming entertainment lawyer Walter Fielding takes the big step with his girlfriend and purchases a fixer-upper for a `steal. As it turns out, the `steal is really a `rip-off and everything that can go wrong, does.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
programme.desc: Chandler and Monicas relationship becomes less of a secret, and Ross must prove to his boss that hes sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl Who Hits Joey
programme.desc: Chandler becomes anxious when he thinks Monica wants more from their relationship, and Ross moves into his new apartment and fails to impress his new neighbours. Meanwhile, Joey is afraid to end his relationship with a diminutive woman who punches him hard every time she thinks something is fun.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds a police officers badge and goes on a spree of arrests until she meets up with the owner, while Joey wonders if he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Inadvertent Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel has an interview for her dream job at Ralph Lauren. All goes well until she inadvertently kisses the interviewer, and at the second interview she mistakenly berates him for his `sexual intentions. Meanwhile, Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebes, and Joey is arrested for stalking a sexy neighbour with whom Ross gets a date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachels new boss and colleague both smoke. When Rachel discovers that they make business decisions without her in the smoking room, she pretends to be a serious smoker so she can be part of the discussion. Meanwhile, Rosss son and Joey audition for the same commercial, but only one of them can get the part.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Cant Flirt
programme.desc: Ross really likes the pretty pizza-delivery woman, but his flirting technique is awful. Meanwhile, a nasty surprise awaits Joey when he tells everyone about his big television appearance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ride Along
programme.desc: The gang persuade Phoebes policeman boyfriend to let them ride in his police car. The friends enjoy the experience, until a gunshot rings out. Elsewhere, Rachel overhears a telephone message for Ross from his second ex-wife.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After Gary confides in Monica that he intends to ask Phoebe to move in with him, Monica immediately breaks her promise to him and tells Phoebe, who worries that it is too early in the relationship. She persuades Chandler to talk to Gary, hoping that Chandlers fear of commitment will rub off on him, but Garys enthusiasm overwhelms even Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Big Break
programme.desc: Joeys first major film role leads to an unexpected experience in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Phoebe cant quite remember why she hates Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang travel to Las Vegas, Nevada, where more than one surprise awaits them. After Ross misinterprets Rachels actions, a war of public humiliation results.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: US actor and singer Josh Groban hands over his phone to play Send to All and Michael heads to Newport for The Midnight Gameshow. Also featuring music from chart-topper Paloma Faith, and legendary funk and soul singer Nile Rogers and Chic perform.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The next stop on Bradley and Barney Walshs European road trip is Switzerland. They take in the breath-taking views with a ride on a mountain rollercoaster, before exercising their vocal chords when they try the Swiss tradition of yodeling. The following day, Barney arranges a unique way for them to enjoy some local cheese, and then drive to the Contra Dam, where Barney reveals they are about to attempt one of James Bonds most iconic stunts, a petrifying 220 metre-high bungee jump.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The father and son have reached Slovenia, a country that loves its sport. Brads passion for bikes gives Barney an excuse to take his dad motocross racing. After hearing that one in 200 people in Slovenia is a beekeeper, they make a stop to meet one.

programme.title: Michael McIntyre: Live and Laughing
programme.desc: Michael McIntyre, star of his eponymous `BBC1 Comedy Roadshow, performs his own stand-up show in front of a sell-out crowd at the world-famous Hammersmith Apollo. Michael regales the audience with tales of driving, child-rearing and `the man drawer.

programme.title: Police Squad!
programme.desc: Drebin poses as a locksmith to expose racketeers terrorising the local business community.

programme.title: Police Squad!
programme.desc: Drebin goes undercover as a nightclub entertainer to expose a drugs ring.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of a group of foul-mouthed elementary school boys in South Park, Colorado. The students, including, Eric Cartman, Stan Marsh, Kyle Broflovski and Kenny McCormick target every conceivable group in outrageous ways.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Katherine Ryan, Layton Williams and Amy Gledhill
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Katherine Ryan, Layton Williams and Amy Gledhill to rip into internet nonsense, incl. bizarre cleaning hacks, drama-filled comment sections and viral disasters. (S1, E03)

programme.title: CC Live: Stand-Up Shorts
programme.sub-title: Sian Davies, Priya Hall, Kuan-wen Huang and Alexandra Haddow
programme.desc: Stand-up from four of UKs hottest comics as Sian Davies, Priya Hall, Kuan-wen Huang and Alexandra Haddow share jokes on coming out, job interviews and awful weddings.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Stand up comic and presenter Jimmy Carr is back to oversee the disputes and deliberations on all the topical events that set the great British publics chins wagging. Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson thrash out the hot stories of the week, from the silly to the serious. The first guests are British boxing sensation Amir Khan, `The IT Crowds Richard Ayoade, as well as comics Holly Walsh and Josh Widdicombe.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson thrash out the hot stories of the week, from the silly to the serious, and are joined by Sarah Millican, Joe Wilkinson, Nick Grimshaw and Ollie Locke from `Made in Chelsea.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Inadvertent Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel has an interview for her dream job at Ralph Lauren. All goes well until she inadvertently kisses the interviewer, and at the second interview she mistakenly berates him for his `sexual intentions. Meanwhile, Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebes, and Joey is arrested for stalking a sexy neighbour with whom Ross gets a date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachels new boss and colleague both smoke. When Rachel discovers that they make business decisions without her in the smoking room, she pretends to be a serious smoker so she can be part of the discussion. Meanwhile, Rosss son and Joey audition for the same commercial, but only one of them can get the part.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Cant Flirt
programme.desc: Ross really likes the pretty pizza-delivery woman, but his flirting technique is awful. Meanwhile, a nasty surprise awaits Joey when he tells everyone about his big television appearance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ride Along
programme.desc: The gang persuade Phoebes policeman boyfriend to let them ride in his police car. The friends enjoy the experience, until a gunshot rings out. Elsewhere, Rachel overhears a telephone message for Ross from his second ex-wife.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After Gary confides in Monica that he intends to ask Phoebe to move in with him, Monica immediately breaks her promise to him and tells Phoebe, who worries that it is too early in the relationship. She persuades Chandler to talk to Gary, hoping that Chandlers fear of commitment will rub off on him, but Garys enthusiasm overwhelms even Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Big Break
programme.desc: Joeys first major film role leads to an unexpected experience in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Phoebe cant quite remember why she hates Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang travel to Las Vegas, Nevada, where more than one surprise awaits them. After Ross misinterprets Rachels actions, a war of public humiliation results.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: US actor and singer Josh Groban hands over his phone to play Send to All and Michael heads to Newport for The Midnight Gameshow. Also featuring music from chart-topper Paloma Faith, and legendary funk and soul singer Nile Rogers and Chic perform.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The next stop on Bradley and Barney Walshs European road trip is Switzerland. They take in the breath-taking views with a ride on a mountain rollercoaster, before exercising their vocal chords when they try the Swiss tradition of yodeling. The following day, Barney arranges a unique way for them to enjoy some local cheese, and then drive to the Contra Dam, where Barney reveals they are about to attempt one of James Bonds most iconic stunts, a petrifying 220 metre-high bungee jump.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The father and son have reached Slovenia, a country that loves its sport. Brads passion for bikes gives Barney an excuse to take his dad motocross racing. After hearing that one in 200 people in Slovenia is a beekeeper, they make a stop to meet one.

programme.title: Michael McIntyre: Live and Laughing
programme.desc: Michael McIntyre, star of his eponymous `BBC1 Comedy Roadshow, performs his own stand-up show in front of a sell-out crowd at the world-famous Hammersmith Apollo. Michael regales the audience with tales of driving, child-rearing and `the man drawer.

programme.title: Police Squad!
programme.desc: Drebin poses as a locksmith to expose racketeers terrorising the local business community.

programme.title: Police Squad!
programme.desc: Drebin goes undercover as a nightclub entertainer to expose a drugs ring.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of a group of foul-mouthed elementary school boys in South Park, Colorado. The students, including, Eric Cartman, Stan Marsh, Kyle Broflovski and Kenny McCormick target every conceivable group in outrageous ways.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Katherine Ryan, Layton Williams and Amy Gledhill
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Katherine Ryan, Layton Williams and Amy Gledhill to rip into internet nonsense, incl. bizarre cleaning hacks, drama-filled comment sections and viral disasters. (S1, E03)

programme.title: CC Live: Stand-Up Shorts
programme.sub-title: Sian Davies, Priya Hall, Kuan-wen Huang and Alexandra Haddow
programme.desc: Stand-up from four of UKs hottest comics as Sian Davies, Priya Hall, Kuan-wen Huang and Alexandra Haddow share jokes on coming out, job interviews and awful weddings.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Stand up comic and presenter Jimmy Carr is back to oversee the disputes and deliberations on all the topical events that set the great British publics chins wagging. Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson thrash out the hot stories of the week, from the silly to the serious. The first guests are British boxing sensation Amir Khan, `The IT Crowds Richard Ayoade, as well as comics Holly Walsh and Josh Widdicombe.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson thrash out the hot stories of the week, from the silly to the serious, and are joined by Sarah Millican, Joe Wilkinson, Nick Grimshaw and Ollie Locke from `Made in Chelsea.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Beavis receives the worst news of his life. Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head pay a visit to their old friend Stewart.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Deep in the Northern California wilderness, Russell stops at nothing to reach the nesting site, Mireya and Bryce find evidence that a Bigfoot family is nearby, and Ben speaks with a witness who had a terrifying encounter with Bigfoot.

programme.desc: The Raneys answer an urgent call from Central AK, where they find a family with all the infrastructure but minimal skills to realise their dream. With subzero temps looming, the Raneys must help them winter-proof and set them up for the spring ahead.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: In a rescue first, the Raneys arrive at a Washington State homestead and find the couples cabin recently collapsed. With winter weeks away, on land with a dangerous predator funnel, the race is on to solve the shelter, food and predator threats.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue

programme.title: Naked and Afraid: Last One Standing
programme.desc: Shocking sabotage and a midnight medical emergency upend the competition; the elimination challenge requires a photo finish; in a test of skills, survivalists must build primitive ladders, torches and hooks to claim critical caches.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid: Last One Standing
programme.desc: While tracking a wild boar, Laura discovers a shocking animal nest. To avoid elimination, camps scramble to build baited spring snare traps. Tensions rise when Patrick questions Jermaines hunting tactics. One competitor is eliminated.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid: Last One Standing
programme.desc: Under the sweltering Outback sun, competitors scramble to build Aboriginal dome shelters and avoid elimination. Medics race to give aid when Laura suffers whiplash, and Trish gets toxic sap in her eye. A survivalist must be evacuated via stretcher.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Sig must act quickly as heavy ice entombs the Northwestern. When Keiths Australian greenhorn challenges his old-school command, a culture clash erupts. Hellbent on earning an ownership stake in the Titan, Jake hauls pots at a blistering pace.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Four gold dredges and their driven but eccentric crews risk everything to hunt for gold on the bottom of the frigid Bering Sea before winter sets in. They rely on custom-built rigs, some barely seaworthy, for their perilous journeys.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Four gold dredges and their driven but eccentric crews risk everything to hunt for gold on the bottom of the frigid Bering Sea before winter sets in. They rely on custom-built rigs, some barely seaworthy, for their perilous journeys.

programme.title: In the Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: This series reveals recent natural disasters as they happened in real-time through footage captured by eyewitnesses who found themselves in the wrong place at the right time and boldly held up their camera phones to capture the eye of the storm.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: Josh hunts for the truth about the Third Reichs Amerikabomber, a warplane designed to obliterate New York City.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: As the fleet mounts a final Winter season push, sad news rattles the Cornelia Marie wheelhouse. Lady Alaska greenhorn, Gabby, overcomes a painful injury to support her crew. Wild Bills deckhands must devise a bush fix or face hauling pots by hand.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Saga loses a veteran deckhand, forcing Jake to steam a greenhorn army to the Russian line. Amid scuttlebutt that ports are closing due to a virus, Josh fights to get home for a reunion with his brother and Sigs daughter gets rushed to the hospital.

programme.sub-title: Barbecue, Batter and Beer Can Chicken
programme.desc: This trip, Guy Fieris grabbing all kinds of outrageous grub. In Los Angeles, he discovers an off-the-hook food truck putting a twist on fish and chips, plus a downtown barbecue spot smokin up the belly and fryin up the chicken.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: This trip, Guy Fieris going from coast to coast to dig up dynamite dishes. In Los Angeles, he checks out a Mexican joint in Grand Central Market serving outrageous octopus tostadas and putting their spin on a burger.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy cruises from Texas to Michigan for killer cuisine with international flair, including shawarma, brisket banh mi, tequila croissants and old-school sourdough.

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.sub-title: Cook Like a Pro: Store-Bought Is Fine

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina Garten is sharing all her secrets and pro tips for Italian dishes. She starts with a fabulous two-fer, tomato eggplant soup, and the leftovers become baked pasta with tomatoes and eggplant. Then she makes flounder Milanese topped with arugula salad and lemon vinaigrette for a modern twist on a classic. Italian ingredients shine in her kale salad with pancetta and pecorino, and finally, Ina makes a cocktail to toast all things Italian, the limoncello vodka Collins.

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.sub-title: Cook Like a Pro: Turn Up the Volume

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina Garten shares a collection of restaurant-inspired dishes to cook at home. Ina cooks with Grand Pellegrino for the famous Raos restaurant and finds out the best kitchens in America.

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.sub-title: Cook Like a Pro: Make-Ahead Entertaining

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: Ina assembles a gorgeous seasonal brunch. On the menu are morning glory muffins, a fresh fruit platter, shakshuka with feta, and a spicy bloody Mary.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Cooking
programme.desc: Nigel Slater unravels the magic behind the combination of sugar and spice, revealing why this exotic marriage works so well in the kitchen. Alongside a classic cinnamon, ginger and plum cake, Nigel demonstrates some unexpected recipes that also have sugar and spice at their heart - such as sticky ribs, and a spicy lentil stew with caramelised onions.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Cooking
programme.desc: Nigel Slater looks to mother nature for inspiration in this episode of the cookery series, as he explores dishes that work thanks to their marriage of ingredients that have been born and bred together. Whether it is flavours that share the same season or the same landscape, Nigel shows us how we can use the principle of born and bred to transform our everyday suppers.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James and Paul are having a blast in Northern Ireland and theyve reached Pauls home town of Belfast, where hes giving James a personal tour of Northern Irelands capital city before they head off for a spot of golf. James pitches up his mobile kitchen right on the green to whip up a tasty dish with bacon, scallops and apples with onion rings. After all his exertion on the golf course, Paul heads just out of town to Carnbrooke Meats.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: Following his French and American Adventures, James Martin explores the British culinary offerings.

programme.title: Rick Steins Food Heroes
programme.sub-title: The River Tyne; Loch Fyne; Isle of Mull; Edinburgh
programme.desc: Rick visits Loch Fyne in Scotland, and meets an award-winning haggis producer in Edinburgh.

programme.title: Rick Steins Food Heroes
programme.desc: En route to completing his journey at John OGroats, Rick enjoys freshly cooked lobster on Crail harbour front and obtains oatmeal from a watermill in the Tay Valley to make the famous Scottish dessert Cranachan.

programme.title: Rick Steins Food Heroes: Another Helping
programme.desc: Rick travels to Bamburgh and tastes some Scotch Pies. After visiting Mike Ainsley, who farms Cheviot sheep, Rick whips up a tasty moussaka, using local lamb.

programme.title: Rick Steins Food Heroes: Another Helping
programme.desc: Rick and his dog Chalky are in the Yorkshire Dales. At Leyburn market, they check out the local dairy produce and, after chatting to the stall-holders, Rick prepares a Yorkshire curd tart.

programme.title: Rick Steins Food Heroes: Another Helping
programme.desc: Rick visits John Firth, who rears freshwater crayfish in Galloway, and cooks crayfish with pasta. He then travels to the picturesque town of Ludlow in Shropshire, which is as rich in gastronomic delights as it is in history.

programme.title: Rick Steins Food Heroes: Another Helping
programme.desc: Rick visits Cartmel in the Lake District, famous for its ancient 13th century Priory and Jean Johns sticky toffee pudding. From her village shop in this tiny pretty village, truckloads of puddings are transported daily to all parts of Britain.

programme.title: Rick Steins Food Heroes: Another Helping
programme.desc: Rick visits Cork in Southern Ireland. At the English Market, the gastronomic heart of the city, he talks to retailers and cooks corned beef and cabbage. Still in Eire, he travels up the east coast to Waterford, a town usually renowned for its glass.

programme.title: Rick Steins Food Heroes: Another Helping
programme.desc: Rick is on home turf when he visits the Tintagel area in Cornwall. Here, legend has it, the ruined castle atop the craggy, untamed cliffs is what remains of King Arthurs Camelot.

programme.title: Jamies Easy Meals for Every Day

programme.desc: Guy Fieri dives into killer culinary and cocktails, from an over-the-top Mexican spot in San Antonio, Texas, to a hidden speakeasy in Brunswick, Georgia.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri road trips across America to check out classic greasy spoons. With a new generation of owners and delicious homemade food, these are the kind of places that make America special.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.desc: Brian Malarkey tasks the chefs with creating a protein-forward masterpiece in 30 minutes. Competitors play a game to choose their protein before discovering theres no salt in the pantry. Scott Conant judges which chef made the best meat-loving meal.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri dives into a meaty smorgasbord, starting with a funky Nashville joint that serves a skyscraper burger. Then in New Smyrna Beach, Florida, a chef cooks up real deal gnocchi and an out-of-this-world spot goes huge with a monster pork chop.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.desc: Guy Fieris heading east to get a taste of the South. A smokehouse in New Hampshire is putting their own spin on meatloaf, a funky North Carolina joint is spicin up their shrimp and a historic Florida spot is making a standout seafood stew.

programme.title: Man v Food

programme.desc: Casey Webb travels to Grand Rapids, Michigan, where he takes on a five-pound tray loaded with chili dogs, French fries, beer-battered onion rings and a 20-ounce soda.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James Martins British adventure travels as far to the east of England as this journey will go, to Norfolk, where he is joined by his good old mate and top local chef, Galton Blackiston. They meet in Cromer, where Galton has a successful fish and chip shop, which inspires James to cook pan-fried cod with a warm tartar sauce on the beach. Then James heads to Norfolk Lavender to find out why it grows so well in this county and how its distilled for oil.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The semi-finalists are challenged to make signature baklava, a German schichttorte, and for the Showstopper Challenge, two elegant entremets.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The finalists head to the tent to tackle their last three challenges. Each one is a worthy winner, but who will be crowned winner of `The Great British Bake Off 2014?

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Once again 12 new bakers don their aprons and head for the iconic tent in the heart of the British Countryside. The bakers first signature challenge is to make a Madeira cake and their first showstopper is the classic Black Forest gateau.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Theres 11 bakers left in the tent and they face the signature challenge of creating 24 biscotti. The technical challenge is arlettes and the showstopper is an edible biscuit box of 36 biscuits of a different flavour.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its bread week in the tent and the bakers must create quick breads for the signature challenge. The technical challenge is baguettes and for the showstopper, the bakers must make edible 3D Bread sculptures.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Theres nine bakers left in the tent and the signature challenge is a French classic - creme brulee. The technical challenge tasks the bakers with making a Spanische windtorte and the showstopper calls for a stack of tiered cheesecakes.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James and his wingman, top chef Mark Jordan, hop aboard their motorbikes to discover the wonderful island of Guernsey. They sample local speciality Gache cake, a seafood platter fit for a king, and James uses Guernseys wonderful dairy produce to make a delicious creamy rice pudding with chargrilled peaches. Finally, James and Mark set themselves a fishing challenge by attempting to catch the King of the Sea: the mighty turbot.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James discovers the delights of Dorset. He is joined on his trip by his mate and Michelin-starred chef Paul Ainsworth. They hop aboard a millionaires yacht, where James cooks a delicious sea bass dish. Paul discovers some fantastic local cheese, while James visits a breeder with mangalista pigs in a beautiful coastline setting. The highlight of their day is a beachside barbecue, where they feast on some amazing pork and chicken cooked al fresco.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by top TV chef Monica Galetti. Theyre in Oxford, where Monica discovers the delights of an organic local distiller. James takes a river trip to a fantastic pick your own farm where he picks some raspberries and he uses them to cook a delicious pudding on the banks of the river. James also visits one of the worlds best chefs, Raymond Blanc, at his restaurant Le Manoir aux QuatSaisons, where he enjoys some of Raymonds Michelin-starred dishes.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is in South Wales, accompanied by Michelin-starred chef Stephen Terry. James discovers award-winning Welsh wine and cooks a Welsh lamb ragu on a beautiful mountainside. He samples the delights of organic Welsh chocolate and visits cooking legend Shaun Hill at his renowned restaurant The Walnut Tree. The day comes to an end at Barry Island, where James and Stephen enjoy all the fairground rides at this famous resort and James cooks Barry Island churros overlooking the beach.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieris rolling out with a little holey moley in New Hampshire, where a joint is puttin out bomb bagels. In North Carolina, a funky spot is adding a Southern spin to egg rolls, and a fun Florida chef is goin prime time with pastrami and pizza.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Loading up the meat with bomb beef and bird; in North Conway, N.H., a funky joint is putting Thai in their tacos, and a local gem in Emerald Isle, N.C., is firin up big barbecue; in Taos, N.M., a traditional spot serves up New Mexican specialities.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieris diggin into not-your-everyday dishes, all day long. In Taos, NM, theres a stacked-up breakfast, unique pot pie and Mexican recipes not found on a typical menu. Skate legend Tony Hawk tags along for creative vegan cooking in San Diego.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieris jumping into a full culinary adventure in San Diego where theres a spot servin Baja-style tacos and a funky food truck puttin out next-level shawarma. In Taos, New Mexico, a pan-Asian joint pulls out the stops with a Reuben banh mi.

programme.desc: Steve and Jane know that the beautiful island of Tenerife is where they want to eventually retire to. Will any of Laura Hamiltons five properties have them reaching for their cheque book?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Brother and sister Tony and Lyn have decided to relocate permanently to the paradise island of Antigua. Scarlette Douglas steps up to the challenge and shows them five amazing properties.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton shows Alan and Carol Fuerteventuras top five properties for their budget of £90,000. But with totally different tastes, can the couple agree on just one property?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Matt and Sharron want to start a new chapter in their lives by moving permanently to Almeria in Southern Spain with beloved dog Sammy. Jasmine Harman helps turn their dream into reality.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: After winning a million dollars in the lottery, a couple from New Hampshire can now afford their first family home.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: A single mum with two boys won $200,000 a year for life. With this money, she can finally treat herself to the perfect dream home near Lake City, Florida with her two children.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: After lady luck rewards a retired firefighter for a lifetime of service with a big win, dream-home hunter David Bromstad helps him search for the perfect bachelor pad in the Lakeland region of Florida.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: When Michael wins $100,000 on a scratcher, he cant believe his luck... until he wins $750,000 just five weeks later; he looks for Davids help to find a townhouse close by his daughter and her family so he can watch his grandson grow.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: After accidentally picking up a Megaplier instead of his usual weekly lottery ticket, Andy won a whopping $5 million. He has now enlisted David to help him find the perfect beach house for all his family to enjoy on the Outer Banks of North Carolina.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: A couple wins a million dollars, but instead of buying their own dream home, they want to buy one for their son that they can live in, too.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: A newlywed couple just won 4.75 million. David Bromstad joins the couples hunt for the perfect forever home just outside of St. Louis.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: A $5 million lottery win has one lucky New York woman looking for a lakefront holiday cottage where she can relax with her girlfriends; although she wants to keep it simple, David steps in to find some perfect properties in the majestic Adirondacks.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Ginny Buckley heads to rural Lincolnshire to help an optimistic couple with a £500,000 budget find a country home that they feel a strong connection with. Away from the search, Ginny visits Lincoln Cathedral, which has stood for nearly one thousand years, and discovers the huge scale behind the conservation plans that will safeguard its long term future.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is helping a retired couple who have decided to escape town life after over 40 years in the same property, and with their £450,000 budget, buy a rural retreat in West Wales with space for their ponies. While in Pembrokeshire, Jules visits Lammas, Britains first eco-village, and admires the impressive results of families who have self- built their homes and are pioneering a sustainable life in the country.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Sonali Shah is on a property-searching mission in North Wales with a mother who has a £295,000 budget and a goal to move close to her daughter, who has already made her escape to the area. Away from the house hunt, Sonali heads to Blaenau Ffestiniog and rides the zip line, one of the high points of adventure tourism which is making its mark in this former slate mining area.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin comes to the house hunting aid of a dynamic couple with a generous £1.1 million budget and grand ambitions of finding a country property in North Devon with holiday lets, outbuildings for their hobbies and acreage for alpacas. Along the way, Jonnie applies the brakes to the house search to ride the Lynton and Lynmouth Cliff Railway, a Victorian feat of engineering and the longest funicular railway in the UK.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Sonali Shah heads to the Norfolk countryside with a couple planning to buy their first home together, who have high hopes that their £375,000 budget will afford them a character property close to the coast where they can enjoy semi-retirement. Away from the search, Sonali scales the heights of Happisburgh lighthouse and discovers the illuminating past and inner workings of East Anglias oldest working lighthouse.

programme.title: My Dream Derelict Home
programme.desc: Plasterer Chris and wife Jemma join forces with her father to renovate a faded grade II listed house into something more beautiful.

programme.title: Derelict Rescue
programme.desc: From crumbling railway stations to abandoned RAF bases, enthusiastic families across the UK are turning neglected relics into a unique place to live.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin is rural property searching with a couple from County Durham who want to border hop to the North Yorkshire countryside with their £600,000 pound budget, and buy a spacious country home with land to accommodate rescue donkeys. While in the area, Jonnie gets a masterclass in building dry stone walls, a distinctive feature of this countys farming landscape.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Sonali Shah is in Cornwall helping a couple with a lust for life and a love of the coast find a home in the Cornish countryside for their £350,000 budget. Away from her very positive property hunters, Sonali heads to Tintagel Island, where exciting archaeological evidence suggests that this peninsula is not just a site of Arthurian legend, but was also one of the largest trading posts in Europe.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Sonali Shah is in the Warwickshire countryside helping a couple with a £750,000 budget find their ideal home, where an open-plan interior and a generous garden are top priorities. While in the county, Sonali visits a family-run pottery business.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Newlyweds and local artists want a large, open kitchen with plenty of room for entertaining. Ben and Erin design a luxury home that leaves the couple speechless.

programme.title: Agatha Christies Marple
programme.desc: Miss Marple helps a family friend seek refuge at a country pile known as Greenshaws Folly, but a sinister shadow soon begins to fall over the strange old buildings various inhabitants. programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: When a woman is found killed in a remote cottage in the dramatic Northumberland countryside, DI Vera Stanhope is taken back to a place full of childhood memories - and an unsolved case from her own past. She and her team delve into the local politics surrounding a controversial proposal to dig a new quarry, and find motives for murder in the unlikeliest of places, but the truth could be hidden within the land itself.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Diana, princess of the Amazons, is raised to be an unconquerable warrior on a sheltered island paradise. She discovers her full powers and true destiny after leaving home to join the fight to end all wars.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Rugrats are in Paris where Chuckies widowed father has been called on to mend an animated monster in a theme park, but its all a ploy by Coco LaBouche - the parks head, to get appointed head of a major company. As she and her henchman Jean-Claude plan to ensnare him, only the rest of the Rugrats can stop him falling for her charms.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: Visually exuberant tale about a neurotic ant who struggles to express his individuality in a colony of conformists. He attempts to break from his totalitarian society while at the same time trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A snail gets the chance to escape his slow-paced life and race in the Indianapolis 500 when a freak accident gives him the power of superspeed.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: Batman and Robin have their hands full when Penguin, The Joker, Riddler and Catwoman join forces.

programme.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
programme.desc: Young and naive forest spirit Mavka, develops feelings for a human musician, Lukas. As they grow closer to each other, an inevitable situation forces Mavka to choose between her love and her duty as a guardian of the forest.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: Curious George

programme.title: Scary Girl

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two sorry siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: An American footballer is given the body of a wealthy industrialist after an inept angel prematurely claims his life.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two sorry siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.
