Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Carmen
programme.desc: A woman on a quest to find freedom embarks upon a dramatic and life-altering journey from Mexico to Los Angeles.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Speak Like a Child
programme.desc: A dark secret binds together three longtime friends who lived together at a childrens home.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: During the Yom Kippur War in 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir must navigate overwhelming odds, a sceptical cabinet, and a complex relationship with US Secretary of State Henry Kissinger as millions of lives hang in the balance.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: Exhibiting Forgiveness
programme.desc: A Black artist finds his path to success derailed by an unexpected visit from his estranged father, a recovering addict desperate to reconcile. Together, they learn that forgetting might be harder than forgiving.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps

Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two siblings set out on a mission to rescue their ex-spy parents. Summoned back to work from their uneventful lives, the adults run into trouble while on duty. When the children are called upon to help them, they find out about their parents former identities while at the same time developing a greater appreciation for each other.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: The sequel in which the globetrotting sibling duo attempt to reclaim the powerful Transmooker device from the clutches of a mad scientist. Their quest leads them to his tropical island hideaway, which he shares with an assortment of mutant creatures.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When Mary Lennoxs parents suddenly die, she is sent to live with her uncle, Archibald Craven, on his remote country estate deep in the Yorkshire moors. While exploring, she discovers a hidden magical garden.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: The Golden Compass

When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When Mary Lennoxs parents suddenly die, she is sent to live with her uncle, Archibald Craven, on his remote country estate deep in the Yorkshire moors. While exploring, she discovers a hidden magical garden.

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Mildreds world is turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, comes back to look after her and takes her camping to find the mythological Canterbury Panther.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Promising business executive Tim is desperate to impress his boss and be promoted. Having secured a huge contract with a Swiss businessman, his manager invites him to an exclusive dinner party where the employee who brings along the most eccentric guest earns a trophy and the praise of the assembled executives. He finds the perfect candidate in a strange IRS employee, but things soon start to fall apart.

programme.title: Coming 2 America
programme.desc: Needing a male heir to the throne, Prince Akeem returns to Queens, N.Y., to find his long-lost son and bring him back to Zamunda.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: Wrongly accused of assassinating top gang leader Cyrus at a rally, Coney Islanders The Warriors have to fight their way home over the course of one long, violent night.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers, and falls in love with, a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies PI company is approached by Eric Knox, owner of Knox Technologies, whose revolutionary voice-recognition software has been stolen. Angels Natalie, Dylan and Alex are sent to place a bug in the system of bitter rival Roger Corwin, who is under strong suspicion, but after the deed is done, the Angels and their sidekick Bosley face the fact of a destroyed home base as well as Charlies life in immediate danger.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The girls are on the hunt for two gold rings that hold the new identities of every single person who has entered the FBIs Witness Protection Program. When some of them turn up dead, the race is on to find the perpetrators, while using their cunning, guile, martial arts and amazing outfits to get what they want.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: After responding to an emergency call from a mysterious woman, a young locksmith gets unwittingly caught in the crosshairs of a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: Fighting for survival at an isolated fishing outpost, Eva and her crew are cursed after making the choice to not help a sinking ship off the coast. Facing the consequences, a darkness consumes them all, creating chaos and death at every turn.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Its been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Lauries ready for him.

When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Its been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Lauries ready for him.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: Fighting for survival at an isolated fishing outpost, Eva and her crew are cursed after making the choice to not help a sinking ship off the coast. Facing the consequences, a darkness consumes them all, creating chaos and death at every turn.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Robert McCalls mysterious past cuts especially close to home when thugs kill Susan Plummer, his best friend and former colleague. Now out for revenge, McCall must take on a crew of highly trained assassins who will stop at nothing to destroy him.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: Kill

programme.title: Head Count
programme.desc: After escaping prison, Kats own revolver is pointed to his head by an unknown assailant. As the empty rounds click away, he tries to remember what happened to each bullet.

programme.title: Barber
programme.desc: A wealthy widow hires private investigator Val Barber to find her missing granddaughter. As dark secrets start to surface, Barber finds himself entangled with shady and powerful men who are determind to thwart his investigation.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: While visiting London with his family, Jack Ryan foils an IRA attempt to assassinate a government minister, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, the IRAs Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: When his wife and children are killed by Florida drug lord Howard Saint, vengeful FBI agent Frank Castle turns vigilante and dedicates himself to wrecking Saints life. He sets up camp in a crummy apartment, but finds his neighbours a little too neighbourly, and they end up involved in his vengeful plan.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A Chilean arms dealer kidnaps a woman and her daughter; crossing paths with his brother, Tan is forced to come clean to his family about his divorce from Bonnie; Hondo discovers that Hicks has received a job offer that could lure him away.

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: A closer look at New Zealand cops as they deal with the challenges of monitoring the nations busiest motorway.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Rescued marmoset Koba clings to life after arriving at the park in a stricken state, and the lemurs at Malagasy find themselves dealing with a quite tricky tree-top challenge.

programme.title: Boosnoo! Mashups
programme.desc: It Is time to spin round and round on the Helter Skelter and more.

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie finds school breaktime overwhelming with so much to choose from. He starts with familiar building blocks before joining in a fun game of tag.

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie writes and posts a letter to Grandad. With Dads help, he draws pictures, writes about his week and carefully posts it in the letterbox.

programme.title: The Brilliant World of Tom Gates 2
programme.desc: Tom is determined not to mess up this years school photo. Learn how to make a Tom Gates picture frame.

programme.title: Silly Animals
programme.desc: Gary the vlogging dog and his friend Rat discover that animals have jobs too, they just arent very good at doing them. Theres a rubbish panda firefighter and an awful penguin ski instructor.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: It is moving day for young male orangutan Hujan, who is on his way to join the nursery group, while Alison tries to help rescued marmoset Koba build up some much-needed strength.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Elderly marmoset Jenny gets a visit from the vet before the arrival of a new life partner, while orangutan youngster Hujan begins to adjust to living life in the nursery.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer threatens to get rid of the dog unless it graduates from obedience school.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer reluctantly invites Principal Skinner to dinner to meet Marges sister Selma.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: One snowy day in Springfield, Lisa informs Bart that she and Maggie share a bond that Bart will never understand because he doesnt have a brother. Bart makes his way to the orphanage to try and find one.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Grandpa Simpson inherits $106,000 from a woman he falls for at his rest home.

programme.title: The Great British Dig: History in Your Back Garden
programme.desc: Hugh Dennis and the team go on the hunt for the Morda Workhouse in Oswestry, Shropshire, to find out what the conditions were really like there. Hugh also visits Llanfyllin Workhouse, where he takes some hard labour like the inmates would have done.

programme.title: Bone Detectives: Britains Buried Secrets
programme.desc: The remains of over 100 young Anglo-Saxon men are found under a planned car park in Hampshire. Tori and the scientists investigate why they were denied a Christian interment and buried so remotely.

programme.title: Gillette Labs Soccer Saturday LIVE
programme.desc: Studio guests look over all the afternoons football from across the country, with analysis of the scores, results and stories as they come in.

programme.title: Gillette Labs Soccer Saturday LIVE
programme.desc: Studio guests look over all the afternoons football from across the country, with analysis of the scores, results and stories as they come in.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: The lights go green for F1 qualifying as the starting grid for the Azerbaijan Grand Prix is set.

programme.title: Teds Notebook
programme.desc: Ted Kravitz is live as he gathers reaction from inside the paddock and reviews all the biggest stories from qualifying at the Azerbaijan Grand Prix.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge paints for the first time since a teacher discarded her Ringo Starr portraits.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: While Bart runs for class president, Lisa falls for her substitute teacher.

programme.title: An Idiot Abroad
programme.desc: Karl travels to Africa to see wild gorillas but prior to visiting the gorillas, Ricky and Steve send Karl to teach at a school, rebuild a hut, go bungee jumping, visit a domesticated hippo, cook for a king, and go animal tracking.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.

programme.title: The Paper
programme.desc: Ned chases a story about a local scammer operating through a dating app, learning that Esmeralda is one of the victims.

programme.title: The Paper
programme.desc: In Toledo, Ohio, a documentary crew focuses its efforts on `The Truth Teller, a historic but declining Midwestern newspaper trying to resurrect itself with volunteer reporters. Following the lives and struggles of dreamers in love with journalism.

programme.title: Katherine Ryan: Missus
programme.desc: Katherine Ryan makes a welcome return to the stage in this stand-up special. Having previously denounced partnership, Katherine has since married her first love... accidentally.

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: The hunt is on for a missing schoolboy. A man suspected of assault collapses in the custody suite and a pensioner vanishes after a night out.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Conrad and Simon go head to head with a mugger trying to rob a bus, while the proactive team raids a massive drugs farm hidden in the countryside. Plus, the hunt is on for an escaped prisoner.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Conrad and Simon close in on one of Thames Valleys most wanted - will the fugitive come quietly? Meanwhile, in a dramatic pursuit, a helicopter tracks the movements of a slippery character as he jumps from garden to garden.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison travels to Hampshire to rescue marmoset Clyde from a life in the pet trade, while the young orangutan Hujan gets to meet with older male Bulu in the nursery.

programme.title: Boosnoo! Mashups
programme.desc: BooSnoo! gets soaking wet in some favourite splishy and sploshy moments.

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie visits the optician for an eye test filled with fun activities. Though he is disappointed not to need glasses like Nina, he happily wears his sunglasses instead.

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie goes camping in the woods with his family for the first time. With Scout by his side, he sets up the tent, tells campfire stories, and looks at the stars.

programme.title: The Brilliant World of Tom Gates 2
programme.desc: Tom gets lost in the woods with Uncle Kevin Auntie Alice and the cousins. Liz shows how to doodle a bug with an umbrella.

programme.title: Silly Animals
programme.desc: Gary the vlogging dog, and his friend Rat, take a look at international penguin cliff diving, ducks who arent particularly good at ice skating and a pair of gorillas trying to do gymnastics.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A visit from the vet awaits one of the parks strangest residents, while the small monkey team lose the battle to save tragic marmoset Koba, who had been taken out of the pet trade.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison looks forward to the prospect of baboons being at the park, while recently arrived marmoset Clyde, rescued from the pet trade, braves the great outdoors for the first time.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Trevor Phillips on Sunday

programme.desc: Flamboyant, fearless, and unforgettable - David Luiz lit up the Premier League with his unique style. From Champions League triumphs at Chelsea to high-stakes drama at Arsenal, his career was packed with silverware and great stories. In this episode, we explore the man behind the headlines: a leader, a teammate, and a born entertainer. Now back in Brazil, Luiz opens up on life after the Premier League and his plans for the future.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael explores Hackney Wick, today transformed from the time of his 1930s Bradshaws guide, when factories belched smoke and the Communist Party of Great Britain launched The Daily Worker.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michaels Bradshaws-inspired rail tour of London continues in Hampstead, where shortly before the outbreak of the Second World War, a groundbreaking Jewish doctor found refuge. Sigmund Freud fled Vienna by train to escape the Nazis.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his 1930s Bradshaws guide, Michael is in London, where he tracks the River Thames from east to west. Michael is drawn to the industrial eastern suburb by the unexpected sound of pipes.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michaels rail journey through the interwar capital follows Harry Becks map for the London Underground, embraced by Londoners since its launch in 1932. Michael finds out how persistence paid off for Beck after his design was initially rejected.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike has an epiphany in New Hampshire when he finds a mighty collection of microcars including one of the rarest in the world.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Frank and Mike discover a few items that are related to historys most infamous figures, including Bonnie and Clyde.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and Charlie pick up a JZR three wheeler speed demon while Dave gets all nostalgic over a brace of Raleigh Choppers, a couple of Honda C90s and a rare Mark 1 Ford Granada.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon repurposes some old suitcases while Henry gives an old dresser some serious bling.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon OBrien are here to turn them into hard cash for their owners. Some stained glass and a Victorian hay rack are among this programmes finds.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Sardonic Victors life continues to be a trial - someone paints graffiti on the side of his house and the central heating system is making a deafening noise. To add to that theres a nasty smell coming from the living-room.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor is convinced he is going insane after being trapped in a shed by a swarm of bees, he is stuck in the opticians for a day with his eyes shut, and then left to babysit some unruly children.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor takes up drawing at a life class, but Margarets enthusiasm for his new hobby wanes when she discovers that he has given the model a lift home.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Beginning with a look at the early use of wind and water power, Fred traces the development of the steam engine and visits a man who has built a windmill in his own back garden. He then sets off in search of early beam engines that are still functioning today.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Travelling from the Scottish countryside of New Lanark to Burnley, Fred talks to ex-weavers about life in the mills and meets a group of volunteers who have spent 30 years saving mill engines.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Fred shifts his attention to the development of the iron and steel industries, starting with Ironbridge Gorge in Shropshire. He comes across a rolling mill which he remembers once operating in Bolton, tries his hand at chain making, and then its eyes-on-stalks time as Fred drives the biggest steam rolling mill engine he has ever seen.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Starting in Cornwall and travelling all the way to Scotland, Fred turns his eye to the practice of mining. On his travels, he finds out exactly how tin, slate, lead and coal were all extracted from the ground.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will and Gus look to make some quick cash as they fix and wrap a Toyota MR2 MK2, but it remains to be seen whether there is any money to be made from this low-spec car.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: 100 motorbikes come in for auction from every era of the 20th century. Also, the team assess a 1965 Vanden Plas Princess with a four litre Rolls Royce engine thats seen better days.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rusty 1970 Fiat 500 goes under the hammer - Derek reckons its the kind of vehicle that is so iconic that it has to be saved.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and Charlie pick up a JZR three wheeler speed demon while Dave gets all nostalgic over a brace of Raleigh Choppers, a couple of Honda C90s and a rare Mark 1 Ford Granada.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Tucked away in the showroom is a WW2-era Willys Jeep. Its original condition means there might be a bunfight for a military vehicle thats ripe for restoration.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: There is a triple collection of desirable cars in store for Derek when an MG Midget, an Austin-Healey frogeye Sprite and an RS2000 come up for auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves son Jack is heading out to Cheshire to collect two cars with a 35-year age difference. And luckily for Mathewsons, Lucy knows exactly what has been brought in for auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A 1970 Excalibur Roadstar, once owned by Roy Orbison, arrives at Thornton le Dale and Derek heads to County Durham to collect a 1935 Austin 7 Ulster thats been completely rebuilt.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Two iconic British classics find their way to the Mathewsons auction room; Dave heads to North Manchester to pick up an Austin A30 and a Morris 8 E thats had an alternative paint job.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: New. An impressive collection of five iconic cars arrives at Thornton le Dale, including a 1967 Crayford Corsair and a 1966 Ford Zodiac which emerge from a garage in Selby.

programme.title: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic
programme.desc: After causing a car accident which kills the parents of four children, Ranbeer Talwar is sentenced to care for them until they reach the age of 18. However, the children are determined to avenge their parents.

programme.title: Chak De India
programme.desc: After failing to score the winning goal, Kabir Khan, Captain of the Mens Hockey Team is blamed for the teams loss and fired. Years later he is given a chance to salvage his reputation, when he is offered the position as coach of the Womens Hockey Team.

programme.title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
programme.desc: A young mute girl from Pakistan loses herself in India with no way to head back. A devoted man with a magnanimous spirit undertakes the task to get her back to her motherland and unite her with her family.

programme.title: Stree
programme.desc: A town is held in the grip of terror by tales of a mysterious woman who calls men by their name and then abducts them, leaving only their clothes behind.

programme.title: Zameer
programme.desc: Maharaj Singh is a proud owner of several derby-winning stallions. One day dacoits attack his farmhouse with a view of stealing these stallions, but Maharaj fights them, killing the son of the leader.
